mapper.insert: insert into Cbusiness (id,pw,name,gender,birth,email,hp,address,companyname,companytp, representative, corporateregistrationnumber, typeofbusiness, itemsofbusiness, companyaddress ) values (#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{gender},#{birth},#{email},#{hp},#{address}, #{companyname}, #{companytp}, #{representative}, #{corporateregistrationnumber}, #{typeofbusiness}, #{itemsofbusiness}, #{companyaddress} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from Cbusiness where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
